metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1170 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high.
metadata.Description: The NVIDIA Display Driver R304 before 309.08, R340 before 341.44, R343 before 345.20, and R346 before 347.52 does not properly validate local client impersonation levels when performing a "kernel administrator check," which allows local users to gain administrator privileges via unspecified API calls.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-310-updates: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
